If a bushi (samurai or ronin) were to attempt to take another bushi's wife,=
 the wife would be expected to defend herself or else commit jigai (the wom=
an's version of seppuku) before she would be taken. Women of the bushi clas=
s regularly carried a knife; in many clans, she also received martial arts/=
self-defense training. 
 
Nina aka "Wave Tossed"
